text: E jenumanja achinawandu! Mun’jogopani M’mbuje gwenu (Allah), ni llijogope soni Lisiku lyangakomboleka nangolo kunkamuchisya mwanagwe, namuno mwanache kwakamuchisya wanangolo wakwe chilichose. Chisimu chilanga cha Allah chakuonaonape. Basi ukannyenga wanganyammwe ata panandi umi wa duniya, nambo soni akannyenga jenumanja ata panandi nkunyenga (shetani) pa ya Allah
